amendment.description: To increase the penalties for violations by television and radio broadcasters of the prohibitions against transmission of obscene, indecent, and profane language.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3464 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 134.

action.text: Amendment SA 3464 proposed by Senator Brownback to Amendment SA 3235. (consideration: CR S7129; text: CR S7129) To increase the penalties for violations by television and radio broadcasters of the prohibitions against transmission of obscene, indecent, and profane language.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3464 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 134.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3464 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 134.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3464 proposed by Senator Brownback to Amendment SA 3235.
